mapper.select: select * from (select row_number() over(order by IM_PURCHASE_PRICE desc) rnum, im_sq, player_nickname, item_code, im_purchase_price, im_bid_time, Im_auction_end from item_market where im_auction_end='T') m join item i on m.item_code=i.item_code where item_name like '%${keyword}%' and rnum between #{startNo} and #{endNo} and i.item_gender!=lower(#{gender})
